actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
  csr.id_composant,
  csr.id_sous_recette,
  csr.id_matiere_premiere,
  csr.quantite_unite,
  csr.id_unite,
  mp.nom AS nom_matiere,
  mp.prix_achat_ht,
  mp.quantite_unite AS quantite_unitaire,
  u.nom_unite,
  u.type_unite
FROM newroseclaire.composants_sous_recettes AS csr
JOIN newroseclaire.matieres_premieres AS mp ON csr.id_matiere_premiere = mp.id_matiere_premiere
JOIN newroseclaire.unites AS u ON csr.id_unite = u.id_unite
WHERE csr.id_sous_recette = {{ appsmith.URL.queryParams.SRId }};
